responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "9043AAAB490BD0099FAD1888393AD5CF", "Good. Thraen\'s a fine strategist, but he\'s cautious. Methodical. While he and Flinthelm ponder their \'spirit\' theories, settlers are vanishing, and those things in the dark are growing bolder. There are other tales, you know? \'Corruption.\' A rot that can twist stone, metal, and flesh alike. I don\'t trust that these constructs are just... \'reprogrammed\' or \'bound.\' I think they\'re tainted. Corrupted from within by something ancient and malevolent awakened by our return. Those screams Thraen\'s suddenly so concerned about? That could be the sound of the Corruption taking hold.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_BrimirColdchisel_4_Response
